7/ @Woarkato mktg
- Inevitable Truth: Your SaaS apps need to talk to each other
- Claim: Non-techies can use Workato to make apps talk
6/ Biggest marketing mistake: Most startups either don't state or have an inevitable truth. Or their claim is not stated clearly.

5/ Ex: Mktg for Box
- Inevitable Truth: Files need to be available everywhere you need them
- Claim: We can do it securely for enterprise

4/ Ex: Mktg for Palantir
- Inevitable Truth: Big data tech can solve HUGE problems for USA
- Claim: We have "Stanford PhDs", tools & will

3/ Ex: Mktg for Storm VC 
- Inevitable Truth: All on-premise apps move to SaaS
- Claim: Our exp at/with Salesforce, Marketo can help you

2/ Ex: Mktg for "Nutanix in 2013"
- Inevitable Truth: convergence in storage & compute
- Claim: Nutanix can do it starting with VDI

1/ Example: Marketing for "Salesforce CRM 1999"
- Inevitable Truth: software should be like Amazon
- Claim: Salesforce can do that for CRM

All startup marketing boils down to:
- State Inevitable Truth
- Make your claim as to how you are part of it becoming real

The OS, app or chat that becomes the hub or context for integration ends up being the next Microsoft or Salesforce. Just ask @SlackHQ. :)
5/ Integrate: Most apps today are poorly integrated. @Workato is solving this. The OS, browser, FB, WeChat are competing on integration.
4/ Organize: When should I delete an app. This is a problem my OS could help with (help remove if not used for say 90 days) BUT doesn't.
Rediscovery: By using organic (its there) and ad supported (try Uber) means, your more popular apps can help you rediscover others.
3/ Usage: REDISCOVERY is the single biggest problem for apps. Even after you install & use once, you may not remember to use that photo app.
2/ Signup: App developers screw this up often making it "feel" painful to sign up for 1 more app. By using it inside FB/WeChat, disappears.
1/ Install: Chat apps make "install" invisible by essentially curating it for you. Want a taxi? Only one choice in Google Maps: Uber.
0/ Cognitive Burden: Humans hate making decisions & commitments. Install, after giving credit card # & signing in to app store feels heavy.

Apps have many problems:
0. Cognitive Burden
1. Install
2. Sign Up
3. Usage
4. Organize
